bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Percy Clayton Hamilton, from Newport News, Virginia, was an Electrical Engineering major at VPI&SU in the class of 1912. He graduated as a lieutenant in Company A. At VPI&SU, he was an active member of the campus: Class Football (1908-1909), Associate Editor of "The Tech" (1909-1910), "The Bugle" (1909-1910), Defending Attorney Corps (1911-1912), and President Lee Literary Society (1911).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a small photograph album belonging to Percy Clayton Hamilton, class of 1912, with photographs from his tenure as a student at VPI, including Corps of Cadet events.
